full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 177 of 228 853 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 A. The books -- 2 MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, lack of foundation. 3 THE COURT: The question right now -- and I'll take 4 the objection after I hear the answer to this question. Go 5 ahead. 6 Q. What makes you say that? 7 8 MR. PAGLIUCA: I'm objecting to this question, your 9 Honor. 10 THE COURT: I am overruling that objection. Thank 11 you. 12 Q. What makes you say that this is a later version, 13 Mr. Alessi? 14 A. It was a later version because the font is a lot smaller. 15 The book is a lot thinner. Our books were about two inches 16 thick. 17 Q. Mr. Alessi, is your name in this book? 18 A. No, I didn't find it last night, and my name originally was 19 in the information for Palm Beach information of the house, the 20 house man in Palm Beach. 21 MS. COMEY: May I have a moment, your Honor? 22 THE COURT: You may. 23 Q. Ms. Drescher, can we please pull up what's been marked for 24 identification as Government Exhibit 52A. Thank you, 25 Ms. Drescher. Ms. Drescher reminds me that this is a sealed 26 exhibit. 27 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018050
